## Description {#details}

Convenience base for all kinds of bitcode abbreviation fields.

This just defines common properties queried by the metaprogramming.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitcode/bitcodeconvenience-h">BitcodeConvenience.h</a>.
